League 1
FC Metz: N'Doram and Cabit hospitalized after a car accident
The two young players from FC Metz K√©vin N'Doram and Manuel Cabit suffered a road accident and had to be transferred to the hospital on Sunday.
04 Nov 2019, 12:00 by Antoine Chirat



Vincent Hognon, coach of FC MetzPromu this season, FC Metz has strengthened accordingly to get the support as quickly as possible.



Manuel Cabit- Club left: AC Ajaccio- Transfer indemnity: noneIcon Sport



Thierry Ambrose- Manchester City- NoneIcon Sport



Fabien Centonze- RC Lens- ‚Ç¨ 3 Icon Sport



Adama Traore - AS Monaco - NoneIcon Sport



Kevin N'Doram- AS Monaco- NoneIcon Sport



Habib Ma√Øga- Saint-Etienne- 1 M ‚Ç¨ Icon Sport



Victorian Angban- Chelsea- ‚Ç¨ 6 M. Icon Sport

Metz: all the recruits of the summer transfer window 2019




Yesterday afternoon, Kevin N'Doram and Manuel Cabit, two young players from FC Metz, were caught in a road accident. They were transported to the hospital. K√©vin N'Doram, unscathed, was able to quickly leave the hospital, but shocked by the accident, he was put to rest for a few days, Manuel Cabit, unfortunately, was seriously injured and is currently hospitalized at the Reims University Hospital. , his life is not at stake, his family and loved ones are close to him, his teammates, coaches and the entire FC Metz bring him their most intense support in these difficult times and wish him a quick cure "explains the club in a release to find below.
